title: Making Friends
message: You need to go out more. It was a great day with talking to stragers and playing  frizbee with them so push yourself out of your comfort zone to really get the best of networking and staying happy

title: friends
message: make sure to reach out and get out of your comfort zone. liek today when i randomly met with starngers and played frizbie with them, i made new friends and even got invited to new parties. always have faith in your slef

title: eating out
